This message reports the precise Galileo time of the most recent navigation solutionincluding validity flags and an accuracy estimate.

column6: GPS time of week of the navigation epoch.See the description of iTOW for details.
Galileo time of week (rounded to seconds)
Fractional part of SOW (range: +/-500000000).The precise Galileo time of week in seconds is:galTow + fGalTow * 1e-9
